Warehouse Keeper Murdoc: Heh...allow me to welcome you to my warehouse! My guild is the largest and oldest of the Dwarven guilds: the *Steel Gate*! We have warehouses in every city across this continent! Ha! Through us, you can send your item to anyone, anywhere!
